title: Thu thangni, rongjalangni boibw
lyrics:
Thu thangni, rongjalangni boibw
Davidni bwi nwgwrao – 2
Mwsou goliao, bwi naodra sayao
Jisu gotho onthao-bathao - 2
 (A)
Gwnwkhw arw laokhar hanza
Jisu gothokhou khulumfwidwng – 2
Somaina-romaina, gwjwusintharao
Subungni gejerao gwjwnnai jathwng – 2
Jwngbw de rongza-mini mwsaglangni
 (B)
Iswr Afaya songsarkhou onnanwi
Jisu gothokhou jwngnw hwbai – 2
Be songsara Jisu jwngnw
Basaijanaini raha mwnbai - 2
Jwngbw de rongza-mini mwsaglangni
